articles.author: ldanziger
articles.title: Doctors: Taking High Doses of Vitamin D Has No Effect on COVID-19 - The Beet
articles.description: People are taking high doses of vitamin D to prevent COVID-19. But doctors warn there is no evidence it prevents coronavirus and megadoses can have downsides.
articles.content: Doctors warn that taking high doses of Vitamin D has little or no effect on COVID-19, and they urge against taking more of the supplement than is recommended since it can have adverse health effects.… [+6787 chars]
